feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.77.2
entry.content:
This release brings a few privacy improvements after the initial release of public sharing in v0.77.0; you can no longer predict URLs of models, and private tags are hidden.

NOTE: new ID strings are generated for all models and files during deployment; this might take some time on large libraries.

What's Changed

🔒 Security 🔒

  • Change ID numbers in URLs to more secure randomised strings by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2625
  • Only show public tags when logged out by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2627

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Restore automatic login in single user mode by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2626

🛠️ Other Improvements 🛠️

  • Don't show sharing settings in single-user mode by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2628

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.77.1...v0.77.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.77.3
entry.content:
Fixes a problem with slow deployments of v0.77.2

NOTE: new ID strings are generated for all models and files during deployment; this might take some time on large libraries (not as long as in the last release though).

What's Changed

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Speed up public ID migration by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2629

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.77.2...v0.77.3

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.78.0
entry.content:
Now you can set a creator, collection, license and tags straight away at upload time! That'll make things a bit easier...

What's Changed

✨ New Features ✨

  • Set creator/collection/license/tags during upload by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2637

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Calculate tag list before model pagination is applied by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2633
  • Fix download behaviour for ASCII files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2634
  • Make sure new tags are used in paths in bulk edit organize by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2638
  • Fix incorrect DISTINCT queries by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2642
  • Fix tags not being removed in bulk editor by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2653
  • Move activity backfill to after permission-related DB changes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2659
  • Sweep up old cache files every hour by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2660
  • Improve error visibility for failed uploads by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2664
  • Make archive extraction thread-safe by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2665
  • Fix changing presupported state causing database inconsistency by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2666

🛠️ Other Improvements 🛠️

  • Update to Ruby 3.3.5 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2641

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.77.3...v0.78.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.78.1
entry.content:
Minor bugfix for incorrect file paths being created during upload.

What's Changed

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Fix error with file paths in uploaded models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2670

🛠️ Other Improvements 🛠️

  • Update README.md by @pedroma in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2667

New Contributors

  • @pedroma made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2667

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.78.0...v0.78.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.79.0
entry.content:
This release sees the arrival of a long-awaited feature, the ability to upload files into an existing model! Now you can add images, extra files, fixed files, whatever you want. It also comes with improved upload performance, and a load of bugfixes for some issues that have been on the backlog for a long time!

What's Changed

✨ New Features ✨

  • Upload files into existing models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2686
  • Add file type icon to blank previews by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2685

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Link tags on model page to list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2676
  • Redirect back to edit page after using new creator/collection button by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2677
  • Make "problem" links dark to fix contrast issues. by @aneurinprice in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2679
  • Fix invisible tag selector border by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2684
  • Fix library storage key lookup by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2691
  • Remove overflowing text on image carousel buttons by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2692
  • Fix bulk actions in advanced admin interface by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2693
  • Send logs to stdout by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2694
  • Fix redirection when viewing a page that requires login by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2697
  • Make sure tag ordering is consistent by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2698
  • Fix upload problems caused by Shrine config by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2703

🛠️ Other Improvements 🛠️

  • Improve performance and disk usage during upload processing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2674

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.78.1...v0.79.0
